5. Automate Your Savings
Automation removes discipline from the equation. Set up automatic transfers to your savings account every payday. You save before you even see the money.

6. Reduce High-Interest Debt First
Debt with a very high interest especially credit cards slows your ability to save. Paying off even one debt significantly increases the money you can redirect to your savings.
